data.text: Oh and it's Carey Lowell, not Carrie. My bad and I'm sorry for that.

And, speaking of seeing it in the movies this was the first Bond I ever saw in the theaters. After this it became a custom, that I've never broken, in that I must see every Bond on the movies. https://t.co/pyQEOCLOpt
Then they're is the gorgeous Talisa Soto who had been one of my utmost favorite Bond girls since I was a kid and first saw this. I also, love Carrie Lowell! Both are stunning!
It's an incredibly badass movie and, for a Bond film, very violent. It also has a great villain. And, Dalton is at his very best. This is proof that he was a great Bond.
